      class  UtilsMethods.userComment

      class  UtilsMethods.userGroup
      Use of the function is to work with the backend api to have the user be able to form groups
      class  UtilsMethods.userMessage
      Use of the function is to work with the backend api to have the user be able to send messages to other users and have this function integrate with userGroup so this function can be used in group as well
      class  UtilsMethods.userPost
      This function will help user post things on chat feed or just a post
